job_tasks.phrase: Data & Analytics has become a key discipline for Global Procurement. We're driving competitive advantage for our client by treating procurement data and analytics as a strategic asset. Working closely with Global Category Procurement and local Business Procurement and the specialists of the global IT department, you will play a crucial role in setting up and implementing our procurement D&A strategy.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the strategic importance of Data & Analytics within the business (Global Procurement) and the need to align technical solutions with business goals by working closely with procurement teams.

job_tasks.phrase: You will have the opportunity to drive the D&A agenda as a trusted business partner.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates the role requires acting as a partner to the business, understanding their needs and driving the data agenda accordingly.

job_tasks.phrase: Leading procurement in data driven decision making and insights generation.
job_tasks.justification: Demonstrates the need to understand and influence procurement decision-making through data.

job_tasks.phrase: from data modelling, data science, automation and GenAI.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions 'data modelling' and 'GenAI' as areas of engagement, indicating involvement in model creation or application.

job_tasks.phrase: Automating content generation (purchasing catalogues) from contracts we've closed with our suppliers;
job_tasks.justification: This task involves using GenAI or similar techniques to automatically generate content (catalogues) from existing data (contracts), which falls under generative modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Automating flow of market price data into internal Cost Price Management tool (running on PowerApps);
job_tasks.justification: While also involving data engineering, the automation of data flow into a specific tool suggests potential modeling or rule-based processing to manage and utilize this data.

job_tasks.phrase: Automating various underlying parts of Source-to-Contract process;
job_tasks.justification: Suggests building automated processes which may involve data transformations, rule engines, or predictive elements, aligning with modeling concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Working closely with Global Category Procurement and local Business Procurement and the specialists of the global IT department,
job_tasks.justification: Implies collaboration with IT specialists, suggesting involvement in integrating or developing software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: You will do this together with the newly formed team of talented data, reporting and market analytics experts.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates collaboration with experts, likely involving the development of data solutions.
This is a core software development task related to data infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Documenting automated processes, workflows and technical specifications;
job_tasks.justification: Documentation of technical specifications is a key software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with the Procurement and IT teams.
job_tasks.justification: Directly points to collaboration in a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: from data-driven market analysis & forecasting to smart data management, to data modelling, data science, automation and GenAI.
job_tasks.justification: While 'automation and GenAI' are present, the emphasis isn't on productionizing or maintaining models in a MLOps context, but rather on applying them within projects.

job_tasks.phrase: You will have the opportunity to drive robotization projects and contribute to efficiency and automation for our client.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on driving automation and efficiency, which can involve MLOps but isn't exclusively or primarily MLOps. The core tasks lean more towards development and application.

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with Global Category Procurement and local Business Procurement and the specialists of the global IT department,
You will do this together with the newly formed team of talented data, reporting and market analytics experts.
Collaborate with the Procurement and IT teams.
You will have the opportunity to drive robotization projects and contribute to efficiency and automation for our client.
You will have the opportunity to drive the D&A agenda as a trusted business partner.
Creating an engaging journey for our 300 Procurement professionals to become true data citizens.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the application of GenAI for automating content generation and workflow improvements within procurement. While it includes data pipelines and general automation, the explicit mention of 'GenAI', 'automating content generation', and implied use of tools like 'LangChain' strongly points to a GenAI Engineer role focused on building user-facing applications powered by generative models.
